story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: Veronica Lamaga was born from a passion for organic lavender and a commitment to quality. What started as a small family cultivation has grown into a trusted source for premium organic lavender products.

We believe that nature's simplicity is its greatest strength. Our lavender is grown organically, without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers, in the sunny Mediterranean region where lavender thrives naturally.
Every product we create is a testament to our dedication to purity, sustainability, and your wellbeing.

header.title: Frequently Asked Questions
header.description: Find answers to common questions about our products and services

items.question: Are your products 100% organic?
items.answer: Yes, all our lavender products are certified organic. We use no synthetic pesticides, fertilizers, or additives. Every product is sourced from our organic lavender fields.

items.question: Do you offer international shipping?
items.answer: Currently, we ship within specific regions. Please contact us at info@veronica-lamaga.com to inquire about shipping to your location.

items.question: How long do your products last?
items.answer: When stored properly in a cool, dark place, our essential oils can last 2-3 years. Bath and beauty products typically last 1-2 years. Always check the expiration date on your product.

items.question: Are your products suitable for sensitive skin?
items.answer: Most of our products are gentle and suitable for sensitive skin. However, we recommend doing a patch test first. Please review product descriptions and consult with a dermatologist if you have specific concerns.

items.question: Can I return products?
items.answer: We want you to be completely satisfied. Please contact us for our return policy details.
